function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air filtration systems","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and upgrade of ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems and UV air purifiers","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Use of unsafe building materials","Impact":"Long-term health issues and respiratory problems for building occupants","Mitigation":"Selection of safe, non-toxic building materials and regular air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Air quality sensors and materials testing","People":"Architects, builders, and building material suppliers","Owner":"Architects and building owners"},{"Description":"Cross-contamination from improper disposal of internal filters","Impact":"Risk of spreading airborne diseases within the building","Mitigation":"Proper disposal of internal filters as medical waste and use of alternative biofiltration technologies","Technologies":"Biofiltration systems and safe disposal protocols","People":"Maintenance staff and building management","Owner":"Facility managers and building owners"}]}
